title: The Herd-HOUR-1-Lakers, Cowboys, Big Ten
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR-1-Lakers, Cowboys, Big Ten
description:
Colin talks about the Lakers looking like a championship team despite the Blazers giving up, the Cowboys not being on the same page about Earl Thomas, and why so many people are upset at the Big 10.


Guest: Chris Broussard

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
